name: ASAuthorizationAppleIDCredential
desc: A credential that results from a successful Apple ID authentication.

items.name: var identityToken: Data?
items.desc: A JSON Web Token (JWT) that securely communicates information about the user to the app.

items.name: var authorizationCode: Data?
items.desc: A token that the app uses to interact with the server.

items.name: var state: String?
items.desc: An arbitrary string that your app provides to the request that generates the credential.

items.name: var user: String
items.desc: An identifier for the authenticated user.

items.name: var authorizedScopes: [ASAuthorization.Scope]
items.desc: The contact information the user authorized your app to access.

items.name: var realUserStatus: ASUserDetectionStatus
items.desc: A value that indicates whether the user appears to be a real person.

items.name: enum ASUserDetectionStatus
items.desc: Possible values for the real user indicator.
